channel.title: Projects on Hai's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Hai's blog

item.title: An R package to retrieve Vietnam stock data
item.description: Why It is convenience to retrieve stock data to R because there are multiple package in R allow you to analyzing and run ML with time series such as {modeltime} {fable}. The{tidyquant} package made it simple by let user get stock data in Yahoo Finance to R in the “tidy” format. However, most of Vietnamese company does listed in Yahoo Finance, hence user must manual load the data into R before take advantage of other R packages.

item.title: Retrieve university entrance exam score
item.description: Why University entrance exam is one of the most important exam of every Vietnamese student. In the year of 2020, by analyzing exam score, people discover abnormal data point and then detect a serious cheating. The full data is normally not public by the Education Department. However, anyone could get the exam result through multiple website by fill in correct candidate ID. This post present how to use R to send API request to retrieve full exam score in the whole country in 2021.

item.title: Vietnam statistic dashboard with R
item.description: In this project, I built an small Shiny (an R framework to build webapp) dashboard to visualize general statistic data of Vietnam. The source of data came from Vietnam general statistics office. The dashboard now hosted on shinyapps.is but it can be deploy on any others platform. You could browser my dashboard source code at this github repo. The repository also had a Docker file to build the dashboard imagine.
